summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a disc containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter providing the password for discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the defendant in the criminal case referenced (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), for whom discovery materials are being provided.

connections.description: Strauss, as the U.S. Attorney, is part of the prosecution team handling the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Password Transmission for Discovery
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends the password for a disc containing discovery materials related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case to the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
It provides the password for a disc containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell, who is identified by her inmate number (02879-509).
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling in the Maxwell case as of March 2021.
Audrey Strauss was the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time of this correspondence.
